docs.abstract: I spent three days picking a Medicare drug plan. I'm praying I got the right one.
docs.snippet: I spent three days picking a Medicare drug plan. I'm praying I got the right one.

docs.lead_paragraph: The discovery of a rare protective genetic mutation provides strong evidence that the buildup of beta amyloid protein in the brain is a driving force in Alzheimer’s disease.

headline.seo: Rare Gene Mutation Is Found to Stave Off Alzheimer’s
headline.main: In Preventing Alzheimer’s, Mutation May Aid Drug Quest
headline.print_headline: Rare Mutation May Help Fight On Alzheimer’s

docs.abstract: Discovery of a rare protective genetic mutation that protects people against Alzheimer's disease provides strong evidence that the buildup of beta amyloid protein in the brain is a driving force in the disease; study reported in journal Nature bolsters hopes that anti-amyloid drugs already in development might alter the disease's course or even prevent it.
docs.snippet: The discovery of a rare protective genetic mutation provides strong evidence that the buildup of beta amyloid protein in the brain is a driving force in Alzheimer’s disease.

docs.lead_paragraph: The law promises to give Americans with mental illness something they have never had before: near-universal health insurance, not just for their medical problems but for psychiatric disorders as well.

headline.seo: Health Care Law Offers Wider Benefits for Treating Mental Illness
headline.main: Good News for Mental Illness in Health Law
headline.print_headline: Good News for Mental Illness in Health Law

docs.abstract: Under health care reform law, psychiatric benefits will finally achieve parity with other medical coverage; until law's passage, people with mental illnesses and substance disorders have faced stingy annual and lifetime caps on coverage, higher deductibles or simply no coverage at all.
docs.snippet: The law promises to give Americans with mental illness something they have never had before: near-universal health insurance, not just for their medical problems but for psychiatric disorders as well.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: A novel method known as whole genome sequencing focuses on genes that drive a cancer, not the tissues or organ where it originates.

headline.seo: In Gene Sequencing Treatment for Leukemia, Glimpses of the Future
headline.main: In Treatment for Leukemia, Glimpses of the Future
headline.print_headline: In Leukemia Treatment, Glimpses of the Future

docs.abstract: Emerging cancer diagnostic process known as whole genome sequencing attempts to discover the genes that drive a specific instance of cancer, rather than focusing on the tissue or organ where the cancer originates; procedure remains expensive but experts believe that it will eventually become a standard part of cancer treatment (Series: Genetic Gamble).
docs.snippet: A novel method known as whole genome sequencing focuses on genes that drive a cancer, not the tissues or organ where it originates.
